summary: So I just had this dream - for some reason I was like hella fucking clingy but he (Harry) didn’t realize that, he was just being...
body:
So I just had this dream - for some reason I was like hella fucking clingy but he (Harry) didn’t realize that, he was just being his usual self - tired from work and all but when he realized I was just being clingy (probably gonna get my period soon) he’s like hella cuddly and lovey!

I also like dreamt a kiss; nothing heated just a peck on the lips- he was smiling really hard so his front teeth was out a little- and after this I, I just want to give a peck on his lips! The feelings are too much!!

Reality seriously ruined my life….

summary: My strong woman. H.S imagine.
body:
My strong woman. H.S imagine.


Where y/n don’t know what’s her purpose in life is, so she runs and find herself in strange neighborhoods.

Hope you enjoy.


Suddenly it was too much. I wasn’t sure where I was, sky was roaring and rain was falling down on me. I’m not sure how I get here, all I remember was feeling so suffocated that I needed some air but now looking around the unfamiliar neighborhood in darkness makes chills through my bones. How long was outside?


A man with suit on was passing , actually he’s the only person I see around the street “sorry sir” I call out for him, he comes to a jolt looking around until he spot me on another side of street ,soaking and shaking “can I use your phone? I need to call my boyfriend, I’ll pay for the call when he gets here” I hadn’t anything with me, not even a cent in my pocket.

He hesitated a little, I mean if it was me I was running miles away, how can you be sure I’m not some robs or some mad woman?


“Please , just a few seconds” I plead , tears gather in my eyes. I was scared, how could I not be ?

“Here” he hand me his iPhone after unlocked it. “Thank you so much” I dialed Harry’s number as soon as my fingers can , with second ring I heard his voice, kind of ruth, like he was yelling for the past hours.


“Hello?” If I was holding my tears at bay, I couldn’t anymore, my sobs came out sooner than any word “harry” I kind of plead his name. Like I want him to appear in front of me, I was scared.


“Oh y/n sweetheart, where are you? I’ve been looking for you everywhere” he said kind of pleading as well. I need him to find me and he needs to find me as well.

“I-I don’t know, I-I …. t-this m-man’s phone … I-I “ I couldn’t even understand my self “it’s ok, take a breath and stand just where you are, did you borrowed someone’s phone?” He asked trying to stay calm for my sake.

“Yes” it’s all I could get out of my lips “ok , gave him the phone please, I’ll be there in minutes sweetheart” I nod , however he can’t see me.

I gave the man the phone , he hesitantly puts it on his ear, the rest I wasn’t giving attention, looking around holding my arms around me.

The man puts his umbrella over my head, when I look up he was over with talking to harry, is he gonna come? Does he found out where am I?


I give him a small smile as a thank you.

Harry true to his words was there in minutes, his Mercedes parked beside the street as he hoped out of the car so fast that I was in his arms in blink of eyes. “Harry” I chock out as he hold me tighter “shhh , it’s over , you’re ok honey” I nod still shivering. He puts his coat on my shoulder still holding me tight in his arms.

By now rain was stopped but it was still cold.


Kevin, Harry’s driver was beside car holding the door for me. Harry gives a look to the man with thankful stares. He hold his hand “thank you so much for helping my girlfriend, here’s my card, please ask me anything anytime you want. I owe you one” Kevin hold out a card to the man.

He accepted the card “no it was nothing. You owed me nothing” harry shakes his head “please accept it as a thanking” I was almost limb in his arms which he gave me a look and cut the conversation short.


He brings me bridal style to house. I was warm by then but still so sensitive to cold. He hold me in his arms as he runs me a bath.

I was in tub, Laying on his chest as he stroked my head “are you better sweetheart?” I nod , it was all too much for a day “I was overwhelmed and I ran” I whisper doubting he hears me , but he did “what for?” His breathes on my neck makes me calmer “it’s like I’m no where in my life, like suddenly I don’t know where I am, what I want” tears start falling down. I was so tired of crying. All I wanted was to be proud of myself when I’m looking in the mirror. I want to feel high, to know I do something in my life.


“I know the feeling, but you know what else I know?” He asked as I lazily shake my Head.

“I know you’re so strong , which you’ll find your way, even if it’s not anytime soon I know you’ll find it and rock it like always, cause it’s you , and I see a strong woman who’s strong enough to accept she’s not in the right place she always wanted to be” he kissed my face, more kissing my tears away “but you’ll find it honey, I know you will”

I give him a passionate kiss on his lips. He holding me in his arms is all I want and need for standing stronger tomorrow.

summary: 8, 18, 21, 24, 26. Lmao. Get Harry off haha
question: 8, 18, 21, 24, 26. Lmao. Get Harry off haha
answer:
Lmaooo ok fine, I’ve been asked to write part 2 for the original one I posted cause poor Harry was snubbed; so here it is (it’s also longer woohoo.) He’s going to have a freaking time in this one, and omg I have to use so many of those prompts ok here we go (Sorry they’re not in order) But thanks for sending them in!

Merry Christmas, Harry - Pt. 2

Pt. 1 lol | masterlist

Here’s the prompt list 😬

*contains all the smut and fluff because hello, I’m writing it. Still not quite used to actually writing smut but anyways here ya go*

A small bump in the road jolts you awake, and you can’t help but smile a little bit as you glance over at Harry in the driver’s seat of the car. The two of you have just gotten back into London from staying at Anne’s house last night in order to spend Christmas Day with her, Gemma, and the rest of Harry’s family.

Your boyfriend slowly glances over at you, and smiles lightly. “Tired, petal?” He asks as he reaches over to give your knee a squeeze. “Didn’t mean t’wake yeh.”

“Mmm not so much anymore,” you tell him, and move your gaze to look out the window; realizing he’s taking a different way home than usual. “And no worries, but where are we going?”

“Uh, um, just need to pick up something,” he states awkwardly, and tries to avoid your questioning gaze.

“Harry it’s Christmas, barely anything is open,” you explain. “What could you possibly need?”

“Uhm, erm… Condoms,” he mutters so quietly, you’re unsure if you heard him correctly.

“I’m sorry, what?” You ask with a chuckle.

“Condoms,” he replies a bit louder, and his face instantly reddens as you start laughing more.

“You’re going out of your way on Christmas to get condoms?” You joke, and he just glances at you disapprovingly. “Oh Harry, you couldn’t just wait one more day?”

“Well after what you pulled last night, no. I can’t,” he pouts, referring to what happened while the two of you were at Anne’s house. “A bit unfair, don’t you think?”

“The most unfair,” you tell him with a smirk, and reach over to put a hand on his cheek; just as he pulls into the parking lot of a small pharmacy; it’s open sign faintly blinking in the snowy weather. He puts the car in park, and looks over to you; as if expecting some sort of sinde comment, but you don’t. “Well, get a move on then. It’s cold. And I did promise I’d make it up to you.”

“Ok, I’ll be right back,” he says with a wide smile as he leans over for a kiss, before exiting out of the car and making way to the store; trying not to slip on the snow covered ground as he goes.

A few minutes pass, and he soon emerges from the store holding a bag of things; obviously he didn’t want to go in there just for condoms. You can’t help but chuckle as he walks towards the car, and he gives you a knowing look. He shakes his head at you for laughing at him, until suddenly he slips on some of the snow covered ice, and falls to the cold ground; all of the items in the bag sprawling around him as he does so.

He lays there motionless for a second, and a panicky feeling takes over while you open the door to climb out of the Range Rover. “Oh my god, Harry, are you ok?” You ask worriedly as you shuffle towards him as fast as you can.

“Physically I’m fine,” he groans, and leans onto his elbows so he can a better look at you. “Emotionally-.”

He goes to complete his sentence but is cut off by a screech coming from you, as you step onto a similar icy patch, and fall back onto your ass. You sit there staring at each other for a moment until he starts bursting out laughing, and stands up to come over and help you. “… I’m bruised,” you finish for him with a pout.

The look of pure amusement that’s on his face as he walks towards you, causes a similar look to form on your features when he sticks his hand out to help pull you back up. With a playful smirk; you take his hand, and yank on it so he’ll fall back down to the ground beside you.

He falls face first into the snow, and now it’s your turn to laugh as he wipes the snow off his face; turning to glare at you. “Think you’re funny?” He asks, and shakes his hair free of the snowflakes that resided in his curls.

“Maybe,” you squeak, and try to compose yourself… but it only results in you laughing even more. He let’s you laugh for a moment as he subtly forms a snowball in his hands, and tosses it at your shoulder when you’re least expecting; causing you to gasp loudly. “Harry!”

“M’sorry… but not really,” he shrugs with a smug grin, and you scowl. You move to make a snowball of your own, preparing to throw it at him as he looks back at you with wide eyes. “Y/N, don’t. Let’s just go to the car like the adults we both are, and go home… No more snowballs.”

You move your gaze from him to the ball of snow that slowly starts melting in your hold, and agree with his words. A sigh of relief escapes his mouth as you begin lowering your hand, and snap your gaze back to him; changing your mind. “Nah,” you tell him, and launch the snowball right at his face.

“Oh that’s it,” he growls and lunges at you; tackling you to the ground, but rolling so that you land on top of him as his back meets the cold ground again, and he starts pinching your sides. “Not so tough now, huh?”

“H-harry stop,” you whine as you squirm in his hold, but he refuses to let go. Chuckles ripple through him as you continue to struggle, and he rolls the two of you over so he can get a better look at your pouting face.
